articles.title: NASSER HUSSAIN: England have gone from mid-table mediocrity to real contenders - Daily Mail

articles.content:
People will say it was only Sri Lanka and they are not the team they used to be but lets put this series win for England into context. They were made to do it the hard way.
It was a fine achievement… [+4868 chars]
